Engine

Class Java2DGraphics

  • java.lang.Object
    • Engine.Java2DGraphics
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Graphics

    public class Java2DGraphics
extends java.lang.Object
implements Graphics
    A Java2D implementation of the graphics object Adds functionality more closely related to the java2D graphics context

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface Engine.Graphics

      • setClip

        public void setClip(int x,
           int y,
           int width,
           int height)
        Description copied from interface: Graphics
        Sets the drawing clip of the graphics context. Drawing does not occur outside the clip
        Specified by:
        setClip in interface Graphics
        Parameters:
        x - - x-position of the clipping rectangle
        y - - y-position of the clipping rectangle
        width - - width of the clipping rectangle
        height - - height of the clipping rectangle
